findings.title: Improper Swapping Tolerance Calculation
findings.description: The price impact can be higher than the tolerance value, causing the position to lose value from a bad swapping rate.

findings.title: Transaction Ordering Dependence
findings.description: The Front Running attack can be performed, resulting in a bad swapping rate and a lower bounty.

findings.title: Outdated Solidity Version
findings.description: The Solidity compiler version specified in the smart contracts was outdated, which has publicly known inherent bugs that may potentially be used to cause damage to the smart contracts or the users of the smart contracts.

findings.title: Potential Upgradable Without Timelock
findings.description: The smart contracts are upgradable and if not protected using timelock, the logic of the smart contract could be modified by the owner anytime, making the smart contract untrustworthy.
